comments.body: This is now fixed in CVS, and will be included in the next Tomcat 5 release.

description:
There are missing mappings for some text in XML Documents. See attached jsp +
servlet. 

SMAP is:

SMAP
index_jspx.java
JSP
*S JSP
*F
+ 0 index.jspx
index.jspx
*L
4:42
7:46,3
9:52
*E

Lines 5,6,8 do not have any corresponding mappings - should be 43, 44, 50
Line 7 is mapped to 46,3 - should be 45,5
summary: Incorrect smap mappings for text in JSP Documents
